chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The JSR-283 specification defines an API for a Content Repository (CR). The PHPCR Content Repository Interfaces aim to provide that API in PHP.

section.title: Port Status
section.para: The API has been ported fully, but due to the nature of Java versus PHP some differences exist in naming and method signatures. Most of the JSR-283 documentation and code examples should be usable as-is.

caution.para: All deprecated methods coming from JSR-170 have been ignored!
